mapper.insert: insert into feedback ( Description, MemberId, CreateName, PhoneNo, EMail, Contacts, CreateTime, IsDel) values ( #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdel,jdbcType=BIT})

update feedback
Description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MemberId = #{memberid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CreateName = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PhoneNo = #{phoneno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMail = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
